quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易因形近词"elliptical"（椭圆的）将"ellipsoidal"误判为二维椭圆，或因不熟悉"ellipsoid"词根猜测为球形/细长形。
quiz_item.sentence: The planet Saturn is not perfectly spherical; its rapid rotation causes it to have an **ellipsoidal** shape, wider at the equator than at the poles.

option.definition: 椭球形的（三维椭圆形的）
球形的（正圆形的三维形状）
细长的（长度远大于宽度的）
